about.description: Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

name: dagstermill
raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  # source-of-truth
  version: 0.27.2
  build_number: 0
  python_max: '3.12'
  python_max_exclusive: '3.13'
  # package-specific
  # from python_modules/libraries/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt/dbt_core_version.py
  dagster_dbt_core: dbt-core >=1.7,<1.11
  dagster_ge_python_min: '3.10'
  # derived
  patch_version: ${{ (version | split('.'))[2] }}
  dagster: dagster ==1.11.${{ patch_version }}
  dagster_python: python >=${{ python_min }},<${{ python_max_exclusive }}
  # utility
  pip_install: -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

recipe:
  name: dagster-libs
  # the epoch is due to a historic issue with `conda-build` outputs
  # https://github.com/conda-forge/dagster-feedstock/issues/301
  version: 1!${{ version }}

build:
  number: ${{ build_number }}

outputs:
  # A
  - package:
      name: dagster-airbyte
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-airbyte/dagster_airbyte-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 38af46e4bc6d0fe947e9b7fa3f5e920c378e479f48a207a1bf26600f5e8bcd11
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-airbyte = dagster_airbyte.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_airbyte
      - script: dagster-airbyte --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-airbyte
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Airbyte with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-aws
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-aws/dagster_aws-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1b496ad90d50277dbf60e13649812592aa582971af6297f74cac7544d824d3dd
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - boto3
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_aws
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-aws
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for AWS-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.
  # B
  # C
  - package:
      name: dagster-celery
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery/dagster_celery-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 99e148964b570f8da31ed019fec855fed7149b45e11cc58ff9307437fbc68cd3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-celery = dagster_celery.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - celery >=4.3.0
        - click >=5.0,<9
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery
      - script: dagster-celery --help

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Celery as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-docker/dagster_celery_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 82146ad92620d9e633c13bbd32d6f703a40952e9ab8395c22c287d4bfcdd99e0
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - dagster-graphql
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_docker
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-k8s
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-k8s/dagster_celery_k8s-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 962653a5e8f7357c0452f2333221c1ed1167fdc21b2b40599193eadb9a362136
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-k8s", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_k8s
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-k8s
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-k8s-executor

  - package:
      name: dagster-census
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-census/dagster_census-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: b8167bd79d7e24eec8c2e04bb8d37fabda4761e3d18509e0e26d9b7f1f63c30b
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_census
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-census
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Census with Dagster.

  # D
  - package:
      name: dagster-dask
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dask/dagster_dask-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 36a5631b608b8d0756431c3189db1b91eeb94eff42e64130505bc301ebe199f3
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - bokeh
        - dask >=1.2.2
        - distributed >=1.28.1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dask
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dask
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Dask as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-datadog
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-datadog/dagster_datadog-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 901f2f148b13de026a877474bdaa78c0f393acdebe5098dc78185f60826f1ec1
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - datadog
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_datadog
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-datadog
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for datadog Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dbt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 9e08df446494b2f6033155e919aba01eba00bdc9fc51ddba9edfd12047796b7e
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud = dagster_dbt.cloud.cli:app
          - dagster-dbt = dagster_dbt.cli.app:app
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_dbt_core }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - jinja2
        - networkx
        - orjson
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - rich
        - sqlglot-rs
        - typer >=0.9.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dbt
      - script:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud --help
          - dagster-dbt --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dbt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for dbt

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake/dagster_deltalake-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 9a4ee6fe175753cec687ad583d2478288c8ad7051e132593b9d4a9012936c313
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - deltalake >=0.25.0,<1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Deltalake-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-pandas/dagster_deltalake_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 9bd6d8b49a65fe831ac6db5e75c3a6b74a0a45a25d8278119d679c66d2e70b46
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in Delta tables

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-polars/dagster_deltalake_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1a42f602f0d75c53b6b49a7eb085078060fb55e1b4fc22eb861ba3904bda8c58
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - polars
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: update after https://github.com/conda-forge/polars-feedstock/issues/194
        # for now https://github.com/pola-rs/polars/blob/main/py-polars/pyproject.toml#L52C13-L52C29
        - pyarrow >=7.0.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in Delta tables.

  - package:
      name: dagster-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-docker/dagster_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 24e1c01ba6ec3f6b7b361483f5e5d9526853c2ccc79ab7233962e4e43c904c3b
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - docker-image-py
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_docker
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for docker


  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb/dagster_duckdb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: ade35a06d7a95eee2a83123792f5cf7d6d0b14e4f1caa3c18592b056391976ea
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-duckdb
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for DuckDB-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pandas/dagster_duckdb_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: f598474beb0699866868e8a8aa94183c5e1628df4bf747a17d60f89215a3abe7
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in DuckDB.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-polars/dagster_duckdb_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: e378d57613b90818e4aad21dc17c783cbc1accf39952dccf4e404c0153f5c39e
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyarrow >=4.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        # TODO: get polars-with-X outputs
        - polars
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in DuckDB.
  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pyspark/dagster_duckdb_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: c32a75084e2c516baf7b6d8a1d643bafeb72aeff78cb3aadbe8aa6a78a8e2287
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - pyarrow
        - pyspark >=3,<4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in DuckDB.

  # E
  # F
  - package:
      name: dagster-fivetran
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-fivetran/dagster_fivetran-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: c4ac6af7137c3f9e59833617e826dccf83f50ee309a10aa6676d0ad0dd983982
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-fivetran = dagster_fivetran.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_fivetran
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - script:
          - dagster-fivetran --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-fivetran
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Fivetran with Dagster.

  # G
  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp/dagster_gcp-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 9c0ad2fbf56f9aa658f5800c980cf7a1c147961e1d0e3b29a6b3d45f18c1d904
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-pandas", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - db-dtypes
        - google-api-python-client
        - google-cloud-bigquery-core >=1.28.3
        - google-cloud-storage
        - oauth2client
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports:
            - dagster_gcp
            - dagster_gcp.bigquery
            - dagster_gcp.dataproc
            - dagster_gcp.gcs
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for GCP-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp-pandas/dagster_gcp_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: ae90ba17f1496dc643609535ebf145a3488165a0a8bda57ec08dde059e1df1c4
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-gcp", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_gcp_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in GCP.

      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Snowflake Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-spark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-spark/dagster_spark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: abe003089aacf40b9d99db3d8f59583926319ce19d515a7e54cfb3e10823904a
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_spark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-spark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Spark Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pandas/dagster_snowflake_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: c60409a3e822eae23d3f117545396bd38d8a690c07b7786decf8c9de79db1774
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-connector-python >=2.1.0
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy >=1.2
        - sqlalchemy !=1.4.42
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_snowflake_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and Pandas with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pyspark/dagster_snowflake_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 79591f54019a9fbbabdd5d6a524a8002f93bf2a30e0ea08c4725a4fbf9417dba
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyspark <4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_snowflake_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and PySpark with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-ssh
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-ssh/dagster_ssh-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1b55d8ff503a6133c70f866df93d49a61c1ed7b63da5b29e3c74b6b8ab648681
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - paramiko
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - sshtunnel
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_ssh
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-ssh
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for ssh Dagster framework components.

  # T
  - package:
      name: dagster-tableau
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-tableau/dagster_tableau-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 99d11ccd2e3e58ea401a6622736630b375e69fef4a0e8510f777f56c626d5ce4
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pyjwt
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - tableauserverclient >=0.32
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_tableau
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-tableau
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Build assets representing Tableau workbooks and sheets.

  - package:
      name: dagster-twilio
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-twilio/dagster_twilio-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 62815c32e086acb37da7696ed2ead33e97d9923166f86dc25ef2babf072650dd
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - twilio
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_twilio
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-twilio
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for twilio

  # U
  # V
  # W
  - package:
      name: dagster-wandb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-wandb/dagster_wandb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: ab4b917a6b79985d274e1e316bbed21ddd66ccde7a8996fd0dbfdd66c055b9e9
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - wandb >=0.15.11,<1.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_wandb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-wandb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for wandb Dagster components.

  # X
  # Y
  # Z

  # not hyphenated

  - package:
      name: dagstermill
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagstermill/dagstermill-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: b9bcb81ceb1c92689b137d10b4e78b7631033c07cf81bf54a1599cba83848fb7
    build:
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagstermill = dagstermill.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ dagster_python }}
        - ipykernel >=4.9.0,!=5.4.0,!=5.4.1
        - ipython_genutils >=0.2.0
        - jupyter_client <8
        - nbconvert
        - packaging >=20.9
        - papermill >=1.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - scrapbook >=0.5
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagstermill
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - script:
          - dagstermill --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagstermill
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for papermill

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io
  summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  documentation: https://docs.dagster.io
  description: >-
    Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

extra:
  feedstock-name: dagster-libs
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - conda-forge/dagster
